meaningMnemonic: The kanji and the word are exactly the same. That means they share meanings as well.
readingMnemonic:
Since this word is made up of a single kanji, it should use the kun'yomi reading. When learning the kanji, you didn't learn that reading, so here's a mnemonic to help you with this word:

<vocabulary>White</vocabulary> surrounds you. The <reading>sheer</reading> (しろ) amount of white is overwhelming.
